question:
Richard appreciates chopping vegetables. Solomon exults in pandas. Davie execrates writing poetry. Harrison dotes machine learning. Gjan adores sailplanes. Solomon spits on buffaloes. Humza finds fulfillment in salsa. Magnus abides the color mustard. Shreyas yearns playing checkers. Oskar lusts after trucks. Shreeram delights in the color navy. Rylee loves luxury sedans. Kiarash is obsessed with peacocks. Troy enjoys urban exploration. Kyie disapproves of skateboarding. Loukas yearns logic. Jamie treasures the color blue. Manson complains about modern architecture. Abhinav pines writing journals. Cassy idolizes stir-fry. Alishan idolizes sweeping the driveway. Sephiroth embraces cleaning the patio. Ian loves skateboarding. Amani scorns cupcakes. Prithvi endorses minivans. Diesil values playing football. Kirk mocks making the bed. Zackary cherishes attending concerts. Jonathon likes cocktails. Lauchlin scoffs at the color amber. Nihal brushes off robotics. Eiddon finds fulfillment in monkeys. Allan glories in playing the mandolin. Muzammil endures listening to folk music. Dennin despises the color ivory. Pearse brushes off pottery making. Adrien is apathetic about the color lilac. Austen can’t bear artificial intelligence. Calen glorifies ballet dancing. Umair can’t bear modern architecture. Callan-Adam curses sweeping the porch. 
Who loves luxury sedans? Reply with a name enclosed within triple angle brackets, like <<<name>>>.
